ygData.subject: RE: Big update to the tinkering site
ygData.msgSnippet: Macho posturing aside, can we get on with life.  If you two want to kill each other, do it in private emails.  The rest of us aren t impressed. Everybody
ygData.messageBody:
Macho posturing aside, can we get on with life. If you two want to kill
each other, do it in private emails. The rest of us aren't impressed.

Everybody please look up this url in the jargon file (meaning 2)
http://www.tuxedo.org/~esr/jargon/html/entry/troll.html and understand that
responding to trolls is hardly a constructive use of time. You want to do
flame wars, join a wizard mailing list.

-----Original Message-----
From: "Joshua Bednarz" <thewhitemage@...>

You, my enemy, are a bastard. If I ever met you in real life, I would charge

you full speed and attack you out right, I wouldn't care if you were a huge,

700 ton sumo, or a muscle bound Goldberg-wannabe, or if you were a weak
frail, dying old granny, or whatever.

<yadda yadda yadda, macho stuff deleted>
